section.p:
tuathanach trang a busy farmer –
Bha na tuathanaich ag obair gu trang anns an achadh an dé.
The farmers were working busily in the field yesterday. td. 75

tuathanach ag obair a farmer working –
Bha na tuathanaich ag obair gu trang anns an achadh an dé.
The farmers were working busily in the field yesterday. td. 75

tuathanach ann an achadh a farmer in a field –
Bha na tuathanaich ag obair gu trang anns an achadh an dé.
The farmers were working busily in the field yesterday. td. 75
